name: parosmia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
changes to the sense of smell that make things smell different from usual, and usually unpleasant : Parosmia often follows infection or trauma. He has suffered from parosmia since recovering from Covid-19.
More examplesFewer examplesCold and clammy skin and parosmia have been reported in less than 0.1% of patients.Professionals are hopeful parosmia is a sign of recovery to restored smell.Parosmia has occurred in coronavirus patients whose nose tissue and nerve endings have been damaged.
